EmailTemplate.name: NorthAM_Lunch and Learn_NY_Q116.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow Thursday, March 10 at the Pivotal Lunch & Learn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for signing up to attend the Lunch and Learn <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lunch-and-learn/nyc]]> coming up next week in New York City. We look forward to seeing you!
Thursday, March 10, 2016 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM (lunch provided)
Pivotal Office 625 Avenue of the Americas New York, New York 10011 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/625+Ave+of+the+Americas,+New+York,+NY+10011/@40.7403356,-73.9973746,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89c259bccd46ca0f:0x68e42baa86fe6915]]>
QUESTIONS?
Contact Reshma Sinanan-Hill at RSinanan-Hill@pivotal.io <[[mailto:RSinanan-Hill@pivotal.io]]> or via cell at (202) 415-1908.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal team
P.S. Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward this link to the Lunch and Learn <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lunch-and-learn/nyc]]> for details and registration.
